overview: Sagad sa Init stars Jomari Yllana as a part time dancer and male prostitute. While having an affair with a politicianâ€™s wife (Sharmaine Arnaiz), he meets and falls in love with Ara Mina, who turns out to be the mistress of the politician.  These illicit relationships slowly unravel during the course of the movie and everything comes to a suspenseful end.
title: Sagad Sa Init
